description:
Performs a bitwise XOR (exclusive OR) operation on two integer values or numeric datacubes.

Each bit in the result is set to `1` if the corresponding bits in the operands are different, and `0` if they are the same. The operation also supports numeric values where the float inputs are first converted to integers by truncation, and NaN values propagate in the result.

**Example bitwise XOR operation:**

```
  a = 6   (binary: 0110)
  b = 3   (binary: 0011)
  a ^ b = 5 (binary: 0101)
```

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: An integer value, float value, or numeric datacube.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: An integer value, float value, or numeric datacube.

returns.description: Result of the bitwise XOR operation, with the same type as the inputs.
